text.__SUMMARY__: The Surat serotine (Eptesicus dimissus) is a species of vesper bat. It is found only in Thailand.
text.Distribution:
Eptesicus dimissus has been found in Khao Nong, Tai Rom Yen National Park, Surat Thani Province, southern Thailand and in Royal Chitwan National Park, southern Nepal.
